message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000. This is a great price considering the value it holds. Let me know your thoughts!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950,000.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm still a bit higher than that.  I'm willing to come down to $975,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's make a deal!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I understand your position, I am still looking to keep my expenses within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $960,000.
